about_the_game:
Invites you into a world of terror and uncertainty. You wake up in a mysterious place and need to find a way out. But it will be much harder than you think. Get ready for an adventure filled with frightening beings, challenging puzzles to solve, and dark humor that will make you laugh.

This game requires you to not only deal with fear, but also with challenging logic problems. Uncover clues hidden deep within the story as you make wise decisions and try to survive. But remember, there are surprises and dark secrets waiting for you every step of the way.

Highlights:

Mysterious Atmosphere: Dive deep into a spine-chilling world full of fear.

Challenging Puzzles: A series of mind-bending puzzles to solve await you.

Dark Humor: Filled with humor and offbeat characters to lighten the horror just a little.

Tense Moments: Be on the lookout for danger around every corner.

Combining horror, wit and humor, Devil's Way offers an unforgettable experience for horror lovers.
